column5: Guys- due to one of our guys mother having serious health issues he and grandson cannot go this year . Premier walleye- lots and good size-and good pike- Fly in to remote Quebec lake 7/30 - leaving from Eastern PA 7/29- return 8/7 - Est cost-$1300we can take 1 or 3 peoplelet me know if any interest and i will send details privatelythanksWall1
Hi - guys thanks for all the replies- we have filled the spot and looking forward to a great tripthanks
